name: Solitaire Pets Arena
description:
Solitaire Pets is a free online Klondike Solitaire game with a twist. Play cards in the #1 online multiplayer classic card game & become a Solitaire master!

Shuffle the cards and get ready to have some fun! The free classic Klondike Multiplayer Live Solitaire card game we all know and love is now available with live matches & exciting challenges against players from around the world!

Use both strategy and speed to move your cards to the foundations for a big win! You’ll have to think & move as fast as you can if you want to win this multiplayer free Solitaire online game. Solitaire Pets combines cards and casual gameplay that will keep you coming back for more.

Immerse yourself in this amazing online multiplayer classic Solitaire card game where pets roam free and epic adventures await you at every turn. Play live Klondike Solitaire card game with your favorite four-legged friends and reach the top to become the next Solitaire master!

Unlock new levels to explore, or take on daily challenges where you can win awesome coin prizes that will help you achieve Solitaire Klondike Master status! Can you reach the top of the Solitaire Pets leaderboards?

Solitaire Pets features classic Solitaire gameplay combined with exciting 1 on 1 challenges! Draw & play cards against other players as fast as you can in our epic live Solitaire challenges. INSTALL NOW & play one of the best classic Solitaire games!


Solitaire Pets Game Features:
- An all-new way to play Solitaire Classic Patience with addicting 1-on-1 Klondike gameplay
- A world full of rich graphics to explore with lovable pet characters
- Powerful boosters to help with challenging levels
- Unlock new levels and pets
- Easy and intuitive to play Patience, yet challenging to master
- Daily Leaderboard challenges to compete against friends & players
- Free Hourly bonuses to collect
- Available on all mobile devices! From the Golf Fairway to the Great Pyramids, play anywhere!


A whole new online gaming experience awaits you - Join the most popular card game of all time and play against other Solitaire enthusiasts NOW!

Solitaire Pets is completely FREE but offers in-game purchases such as special boosters and coin packages. Solitaire Pets is definitely one of the best online Card Games you can find - Install now and see if you have what it takes to beat other players from around the globe in this powerful solitaire card game.

Whether you’re a Solitaire master or a fan of classic card games like Pyramid or Golf, Solitaire Pets is the perfect way to play Klondike Solitaire. What are you waiting for? Shuffle up and deal the cards!
